Name: Blazing Ruff
LongDescription: Absorbs damage from Water-type moves to restore HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Chimchar, Monferno, and Infernape.  You can get a Blazing Ruff at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: an Infern-Hair, an Infern-Fang, and an Infern-Seal. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
